meanings.definition: A chemical compound derived from toluene.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the properties of toluidide in the lab.
meanings.sent2: The factory produced a large quantity of toluidide for various experiments.
meanings.sent3: The toluidide molecule decided to throw a party with other compounds.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was like a colorful toluidide painting, vibrant and unique.
meanings.sent5: The students marveled at the intricate structure of the toluidide under the microscope.

meanings.definition: A type of dye used in the textile industry.
meanings.sent1: The fashion designer carefully selected the perfect shade of toluidide for the dress.
meanings.sent2: The textile factory imported a new batch of toluidide for their latest collection.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat accidentally spilled toluidide on the fabric, creating a tie-dye effect.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as bright and vibrant as the toluidide colors on the cloth.
meanings.sent5: The artist skillfully blended different shades of toluidide to create a stunning masterpiece.
